message:
سا الخير :) , الناس بتوع ال front-end, من الصبح بدور علي حاجة ت flip ال Bootstrap عشان يكون RTL و مش لاقي, المشروع الوحيد الي لقيته أخر commit عليه من سنتين !! حد عنده حل ؟! مش معقولة حاجة بالجمال ده و الواحد مش عارف يستخدمها ف مشاريع عربية :(

و انا قاعد من الصبح أمال أحول كل Bootstrap component  ل AngularJS Directive و فرحااان, و قول خلاص بقي الواحد لقي combination محترمة لل front-end بس للأسف كده مش هاتفيدني في المشاريع العربية, حد عنده حل ؟

شكراً مقدماً.

data.message:
Googling "Bootstrap RTL" gave me this, which was updated 5 days ago!!!
https://github.com/morteza/bootstrap-rtl
وقع ف إيدي, أفضلم, بس ف حجات ضاربة كتير :( , مش عارف ليه المشروع نفسه مايدعمش ال rtl يا رب ال major release الجاية تدعم ال rtl . شكلها هاترسي علي الحل ده و خلاص

Creating an RTL override for Bootstrap is a 30 minute job, I almost do it manually on every project ...
I am considering now releasing my override soon
صدق مافكرتش ف الحوار ده :) هههه, بس المفترض بقي تكون مغطي اغلب ال components , شكراً مقدماً

This is the asshole who is reponsible for removing RTL from Bootstrap 3:
https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap/issues/13564#issuecomment-44230448
Mohammad Tayseer the problem with the flipping tools is that you are replicating the same file ... not just creating an override, so you end up with two CSS files that are almost identical.
إشطه, هي رسيت خلاص علي الحل بتاع الأخ Morteza ده, يا إما بقي يا Ahmad Alfy تظبطنا أنته و نلاقي الرابط ع github قريب :) Thnx y man
Ahmad Alfy By asshole you mean morteza ?

Mohammad Tayseer Probably I shouldn't have said that but I was offended with that thread. Most of the things he is arguing about is invalid and I reached a conclusion that he is only doing this to promote his own work. There was literally hundreds of requests pushing mdo and fat to support RTL ... after it was done, he started his thread and boom it is gone. I hate myself for saying that but he really is an asshole ... I sent him an email explaining my opinion about that issue and he replied that I am bullying and harrasing him. He reported me to github at the end.
Ahmad Alfy I almost agree with you, but also I don't know why mdo listened to him
